github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Always follow the conventional commits specification exactly.
Use the appropriate commit type (feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore) based on the changes.
Include a scope in parentheses when appropriate (e.g., feat(extension): or fix(ui):).
Use imperative, present tense verbs (add, fix, update) and don't capitalize the first letter or use a period at the end.
Keep the first line under 72 characters.
Indicate breaking changes with ! after the type/scope or by including BREAKING CHANGE: in the footer.
